chapter.text: 23|1|Ba rosti, ki mu'minon rastagor sudand
23|2|Hamon kasone, ki dar namozason furutan hastand
23|3|Va onon, ki az [guftoru raftori] ʙehuda rujgardonand
23|4|Va onon, ki zakot mepardozand
23|5|Va onon, ki sarmgohasonro hifz mekunand
23|6|Magar dar mavridi hamsaron jo kanizonason, ki [dar ʙahragirii cinsi az onho] nakuhise ʙar onon nest
23|7|Pas, har ki farotar az in ʙixohad, ononand, ki az had darguzastaand
23|8|Va [dar zumrai mu'minonand] kasone, ki amonatho va ahdi xudro riojat mekunand
23|9|Va kasone, ki ʙar [adoi] namozhojason muroqiʙat mekunand
23|10|Inonand, ki vorison hastand
23|11|[Hamon] Kasone, ki ʙihisti ʙarinro ʙa irs meʙarand [va] dar on covidonand
23|12|Va dar haqiqat, insonro az cakidae az gil ofaridem
23|13|Sipas uro ʙa sakli nutfae dar qarorgohe ustuvor [rahim] nihodem

23|14|Sipas nutfaro [Ba sakli] xuni ʙasta soxtem va on goh xuni ʙastaro [ʙa surati] poraguste soxtem, sipas poragustro [ʙa sakli] ustuxon darovardem va on goh ʙar ustuxonho gust pusonidem. Sipas on [canin]-ro ofarinise digar ʙaxsidem. Pas, [purʙarakatu] ʙuzurgvor ast Alloh taolo, ki nakutarin ofarinanda ast
23|15|Sipas sumo [pas az taji marohili zindagi] hatman, xohed murd
23|16|On goh ʙe tardid, dar ruzi qijomat ʙarangexta mesaved
23|17|Va ʙa jaqin Mo ʙar farozaton haft osmon ofaridem va [hargiz] az ofarinis ƣofil naʙudaem
23|18|Va az osmon ʙa andozae muajjan [ʙaroi nijozi maxluqot] oʙe firistodem va onro dar zamin coj dodem va hatman, ʙaroi az ʙajn ʙurdanas [niz] komilan tavonoem
23|19|Sipas tavassuti on [oʙ] ʙarojaton ʙoƣhoe az daraxtoni xurmo va angur padid ovardem, ki dar on [ʙoƣho] ʙaroi sumo mevahoe ʙisjore ast va az on [mahsulot] mexured
23|20|Va daraxte [ofaridem], ki az Turi Sino ʙarmeojad va ravƣani [zajtun] medihad va xurise ʙaroi xurandagon ast

23|21|Va ʙe tardid, ʙaroi sumo dar [vucudi] cahorpojon iʙrate [az qudrati Alloh taolo] ast: az on ci dar sikami onhost ʙa sumo [sir] menusonem va dar [vucudi] onho ʙarojaton sudhoi ʙisjore vucud dorad va az [gusti] onho mexured
23|22|[Dar xuski] Bar onho savor mesaved va [dar oʙ] ʙar kistiho
23|23|Va ʙe tardid, Mo Nuhro ʙa suji qavmas firistodem, pas, [ʙa onon] guft: «Ej qavmi man, Allohro ʙiparasted [ki] cuz U ma'ʙude [ʙa haq] nadored. Ojo parvo namekuned?»

23|24|Pas, asrof va ʙuzurgoni qavmas, ki kufr varzida ʙudand, guftand: «In [mard kase] nest, magar ʙasare hamcun sumo, [ki] mexohad ʙar sumo ʙartari cujad. Agar Alloh taolo mexost, faristagone [ʙa sujaton] nozil mekard. Mo inro [ki Nuh megujad] dar mijoni nijogoni xud nasnidaem
23|25|U mardi devonae ʙes nest. Pas, to muddate muntazir ʙosed [ki jo duruƣas oskor gardad va dast az da'vatas ʙardorad jo margas faro rasad]
23|26|[Nuh] Guft: «Parvardigoro, maro dar ʙaroʙari takziʙi onon jori kun»

23|27|Pas, ʙa u vahj kardem: «Kistiro tahti nazari Mo va ʙa vahji Mo ʙisoz va hangome ki farmoni [azoʙi] Mo faro rasad va [ʙa nisonai rasidani tufon oʙ az] tanur cusad, az har nav'i [hajvon] jak cufti [naru moda] dar kisti savor kun va xonavodaatro [niz hamrohi xud ʙuʙar], magar kasone, ki pestar va'da [-i halok] ʙar onon muqarrar sudaast va dar ʙorai [nacoti] kasone, ki sitam kardaand, ʙo Man suxan nagu, [caro ki] onon hatman, ƣarq xohand sud
23|28|Pas, hangome ki tu va hamrohonat ʙar kisti savor suded, ʙigu: «Sipos maxsusi Alloh taolo ast, ki moro az [cangi] guruhi sitamgor nacot dod»
23|29|Va [niz] ʙigu: «Parvardigoro, moro dar manzilgohe purʙarakat furud ovar, ki Tu ʙehtarin furudovarandai»
23|30|Be tardid, dar in [mocaro] nisonahoe [az qudrati Alloh taolo dar nacoti mu'minon va azoʙi kofiron] ast va jaqinan, Mo ozmoisgar [-i imon va kufri mardum] ʙudaem
23|31|On goh guruhi digarero pas az onon padid ovardem
23|32|Va az xudason pajomʙare dar [mijoni] onon firistodem [to ʙigujad]: «Allohro ʙiparasted, [ki] cuz U ma'ʙude [ʙa haq] nadored. Ojo parvo namekuned?»

23|33|Guruhe az asrof va ʙuzurgoni qavmas, ki kufr varzida ʙudand va didori oxiratro duruƣ meangostand va dar zindagii dunjo ʙa onon ne'matu osois doda ʙudem, guftand: «In [mard kase] nest, magar ʙasare hamcun sumo. Az on ci [sumo] mexured, [u niz] mexurad va az on ci ki sumo menused, [u niz] menusad [pas, ʙartarie nadorad, ki pajomʙar ʙosad]
23|34|Va agar az ʙasare hamcun xud itoat kuned, dar on surat jaqinan, zijonkored
23|35|Ojo u ʙa sumo va'da medihad, ki vaqte murded va xoku ustuxon suded, [dar qijomat az gur] ʙerun ovarda mesaved
23|36|On ci ʙa sumo va'da medihad, ci dur ast, ci dur
23|37|[Zindagoni] Cuz hamin zindagii dunjoii mo nest. [Guruhe] Memirem [va guruhe ʙa coji onho] zinda mesavem va hargiz [pas az marg] ʙarangexta naxohem sud
23|38|U [kase] nest, magar mardest, ki ʙar Alloh taolo duruƣ meʙandad va mo ʙa u imon nameovarem»
23|39|[Pajomʙarason] Guft: «Parvardigoro, maro dar ʙaroʙari takziʙi onon jori kun»
23|40|[Alloh taolo] Farmud: «Pas az andak zamone, [az kori xud] saxt pusajmon mesavand»
23|41|Pas, ʙong [-i margʙor]-e ononro ʙa haq furu girift va [hamcun] xoru xosokason namudem. Pas, qavmi sitamgor [az rahmati Alloh taolo] dur ʙod
23|42|Sipas ʙa'd az onon naslhoe digar padid ovardem
23|43|Hec ummate na az acali xud pesi megirad va na ta'xir mekunad

23|44|Sipas pajomʙaroni xudro pajopaj firistodem. Har goh pajomʙare ʙaroi [hidojati] ummate meomad, uro duruƣgu meangostand, pas, [Mo niz] ononro jake pas az digare halok kardem va ononro dostonho [-i iʙratomuze ʙaroi ojandagon] qaror dodem. Pas, noʙud ʙod, qavme, ki imon nameovarand
23|45|Sipas Muso va ʙarodaras Horunro ʙo ojoti [nuhgonai] xes va daloili oskor firistodem
23|46|Ba suji Fir'avn va asrofi [qavmi] u, vale onon gardankasi kardand va guruhe ʙartarixoh ʙudand
23|47|Va guftand: «Ojo ʙa du insoni monandi xud imon ʙijovarem, hol on ki qavmason ʙardagoni mo hastand?»
23|48|Pas on duro duruƣgu angostand, [va] sarancom halok sudand
23|49|Va ʙe tardid, ʙa Muso kitoʙi [Tavrot] dodem, ʙosad, ki [Bani Isroil] hidojat savand
23|50|Va pisari Marjam va modarasro nisonae [az qudrati ilohi] karor dodem va ononro dar makone ʙaland va hamvore, ki doroi amnijat va oʙe [zulolu] cori ʙud, coj dodem
23|51|Ej pajomʙaron, az [ƣizohoi] pokiza ʙixured va kori soista ancom dihed. Jaqinan, man ʙa on ci mekuned, ogoham
23|52|Va dar haqiqat, in dini sumo dini vohid [ʙa nomi islom] ast va man Parvardigoraton hastam. Pas, az man parvo kuned [ʙitarsed]
23|53|Ammo [pajravonason ixtilof kardand va] dar kori dinason mijoni xud firqa-firqa va parokanda gastand va har guruhe ʙa on ci nazdason ast, dilxusand [caro ki xudro ʙar haq medonand]
23|54|Pas, [ej pajomʙar] ononro to vaqte [ki azoʙ faro merasad] dar cahlu nodonison raho kun
23|55|Ojo gumon mekunand, on ci az sarvatu farzandon, ki ʙa onon medihem
23|56|[ʙaroi in ast, ki] sitoʙon nekihoro ʙa eson ʙirasonem? [Na, hargiz cunin nest] Balki onon [haqiqatro] darnamejoʙand
23|57|Kasone, ki az ʙimi Parvardigorason tarsonand
23|58|Va kasone, ki ʙa ojoti Parvardigorason imon meovarand
23|59|Va kasone, ki ʙa Parvardigorason sirk namevarzand
23|60|Va kasone, ki dar ancomi korhoi xajr mekusand va az in ki ʙa suji Parvardigori xes ʙozmegardand, [va az in ki korhoi nekason maqʙuli dargohi haq voqe' nasavad] dilhojason haroson ast
23|61|Inon dar nekiho sitoʙ mekunand va dar ancomi on [az jakdigar] pesi megirand
23|62|Va [Mo] ʙa hec kas cuz ʙa andozai tavonas taklif namekunem va nazdi Mo kitoʙest, ki [dar ʙorai a'moli ʙandagon] ʙa haq suxan megujad va ʙa onon sitam namesavad
23|63|[Na] Balki dilhojason az in [kitoʙ] dar ƣaflat ast va onon ʙa cuz in [gunohi kufr] korhoe [digar niz] ancom medihand
23|64|To hangome ki sarvatmandonasonro ʙa azoʙ giriftor kunem, nogahon farjodi zori sar medihand
23|65|[Ba onon gufta mesavad] «Imruz nola va zori nakuned, [ki] hargiz az suji mo jori naxohed sud
23|66|Be tardid, ojoti Man pajvasta ʙar sumo xonda mesud, vale [az haq] ruj megardoned
23|67|Dar hole ki dar ʙaroʙaras takaʙʙur mekarded [va dar macolisi saʙonai xud] ʙa ʙadgui mepardoxted
23|68|Ojo onon dar in guftor [Qur'on] najandesidaand jo [magar] cize ʙarojason omada, ki ʙaroi nijogonason najomadaast
23|69|Jo pajomʙarasonro nasinoxtaand va [az in rust, ki] inkoras mekunand
23|70|Jo megujand, u cunun dorad? [Na, cunin nest] Balki [u dini] haqro ʙarojason ovardaast, vale ʙestarason az [pazirisi] haq noxusnudand

23|71|Agar Alloh taolo az havashoi onon pajravi kunad [va umuri hasti ʙa majli kofiron idora savad], osmonho va zamin va har ki dar onhost, taʙoh megardad, ʙalki ʙaroi onon pandason [Qur'on]-ro ovardaem [ki mojai izzatu sarafason ast], vale onon az pandason rujgardonand
23|72|[Ej Pajomʙar] Ojo tu az onon [ʙaroi taʙliƣi din] podose metalaʙi? Va hol on ki podosi Parvardigorat [ʙase] ʙehtar ast va U ʙehtarin ruzidihanda ast
23|73|Va ʙe tardid, tu ononro ʙa rohe rost da'vat mekuni
23|74|Kasone, ki ʙa oxirat imon nadorand, hatman az in rohi [rost] munharif sudaand
23|75|Agar ʙa onon rahm kunem va ʙalovu rancero, ki [az qahti va gurusnagi] didaand, az eson ʙartaraf sozem, ʙar sarkasi [va gumrohii] xes pofisori mekunand [va hamcunon] ʙa ʙeroha meravand
23|76|Dar haqiqat, [Mo] ononro ʙa azoʙ [-u ʙalo] giriftor soxtem [to ʙedor savand], ammo dar ʙaroʙari Parvardigorason furutani nanamudand va [ʙa dargohas tazarru' va] zori nakardand
23|77|[Onon pajvasta cunin hastand] To on goh ki dare az azoʙi saxt ʙar onon mekusoem [va cunon giriftor savand], ki [az hama co] ma'jus gardand
23|78|[Ej munkironi qijomat] Alloh taolo ast, ki ʙaroi sumo gusu casm va dil padid ovard. Ci andak sipos meguzored
23|79|Va Ust, ki sumoro dar zamin [ofarid va] parokanda kard va [ruzi qijomat] ʙa suji U cam' mesaved
23|80|Va Ust, ki zinda mekunad va memironad va ixtilofi saʙu ruz az tadʙiri Ust. Ojo nameandesed
23|81|[Cunin nakardand] Balki onon niz hamon [suxanonero] guftand, ki pesinijon meguftand
23|82|Guftand: «Ojo hangome ki murdemu xoku ustuxon sudem, ʙarangexta xohem sud
23|83|Be tardid, in va'daro pes az in niz ʙa mo va nijogonamon dodaand. In [suxan cize] nest, magar [duruƣho va] afsonahoi pesinijon»
23|84|[Ej pajomʙar, ʙa munkironi meod] ʙigu: «Agar medoned, [ʙigued], zamin va har ki dar on ast, az oni kist?»
23|85|Xohand guft: «[Hama] Az oni Alloh taolo ast». Bigu: «Pas, ojo pand namegired?»
23|86|Bigu: «Parvardigori haft osmon va Parvardigori Arsi ʙuzurg kist?»
23|87|Xohand guft: «[Hama] Az oni Alloh taolo ast». Bigu: «Pas, ojo [az Alloh taolo] parvo namekuned?»
23|88|Bigu: «Agar medoned, [ʙigued] farmonravoii hama ciz ʙa dasti kist? Va [kist, ki] panoh medihad va kase dar ʙaroʙari [azoʙi] u panoh nadorad?»
23|89|Xohand guft: «[Farmonravoii hama ciz] Az oni Alloh taolo ast». Bigu: «Pas, ci guna afsun mesaved [va nameandesed]?»
23|90|[Cunin nest, ki kofiron gumon mekunand] Balki Mo haqro ʙarojason ovardem va jaqinan, onon duruƣgu hastand

23|91|Alloh taolo hargiz farzande ʙarnaguzidaast va hec ma'ʙude ʙo U nest. [Agar cunin ʙud] On goh har ma'ʙude on ciro ofarida ʙud, [ʙo xud] meʙurd va musallaman, ʙarxe ʙar ʙarxe digar ʙartari mecustand [va nizomi hasti taʙoh megast]. Alloh taolo az on ci [musrikon] tavsif mekunand, munazzah ast
23|92|U donoi nihonu oskor ast va az on ci ʙo Vaj sarik mesozand, ʙartar ast
23|93|Bigu: «Parvardigoro, agar on [azoʙe]-ro, ki ʙa onon va'da doda mesavad, ʙa man nison medihi [ki sohidas ʙosam]
23|94|pas, Parvardigoro maro dar [hangomi azoʙ dar kanori in] guruhi sitamgor qaror madeh»
23|95|Va hatman, Mo tavonoem, ki on ciro ʙa onon va'da medihem, ʙa tu nison dihem
23|96|[Ej pajomʙar] ʙadiro ʙa sevae, ki ʙehtar ast, daf' kun [va ʙuʙaxsu sikeʙo ʙos]. Mo ʙa on ci [musrikon dar ʙorai tu] tavsif mekunand, donotarem
23|97|Va ʙigu: «Parvardigoro, man az vasvasahoi sajotin ʙa Tu panoh meʙaram
23|98|Va Parvardigoro, az in ki onho nazdi man hozir savand, [niz] ʙa Tu panoh meʙaram»

23|99|[Kofiron pajvasta ʙar aqidai ʙotilason hastand] To hangome ki margi jake az onon faro rasad, [on goh dar hole ki] nazdi Parvardigori [xud nolavu zori mekunad, ʙa faristagon] megujad: «Maro [ʙa dunjo] ʙozgardoned

23|100|Sojad dar on ci [kutohi namuda va] tark kardam, kori soistae ancom diham». Hargiz cunin nest. Be tardid, in faqat suxane ast, ki u ʙa zaʙon megujad [va hargiz raftoras taƣjir namekunad] va ruze, ki ʙarangexta savand, pusti sarason ʙarzaxest
23|101|Ruze, ki dar sur damida mesavad, hec jak az [ iftixoroti xonavodagi va] pajvandhoi xesovandi mijonason [ʙarqaror] naxohad ʙud va [az vahsati azoʙ] az [holi] jakdigar namepursand
23|102|Va har ki vaznai a'molas sangin ʙosad, ononand, ki rastagorand
23|103|Va har ki vaznai a'molas saʙuk ʙosad, ononand, ki ʙa xes zijon zadaand va dar duzax covidonand
23|104|Otas cehrahojasonro mesuzonad va dar on co rujturs va zistmanzarand
23|105|[Ba onon gufta mesavad] «Magar na in ʙud, ki ojotam ʙar sumo xonda mesud va onhoro duruƣ meangosted?»
23|106|[Dar posux] Megujand: «Parvardigoro, ʙadʙaxti ʙar mo cira sud va guruhe gumroh ʙudem
23|107|Parvardigoro, moro az in [duzax] ʙerun ovar. Pas, agar [ʙa kufru nofarmoni] ʙozgastem, hatman, sitamgorem»
23|108|[Alloh taolo] Mefarmojad: «Dar on [otas] gum saved va ʙo Man suxan nagued
23|109|Guruhe az ʙandagonam meguftand: «Parvardigoro, imon ovardem, pas, moro ʙiʙaxso va ʙar mo rahm kun, [ki] ʙe tardid, Tu ʙehtarin ʙaxsojandai»
23|110|Vale sumo ononro masxara mekarded, to coje, ki [sargarm sudan ʙa tamasxuri eson] zikr [-u iʙodati] Maro az jodaton ʙurd va hamcunon ʙa onon mexandided
23|111|Imruz Man ononro az on cihate, ki sikeʙoi kardand, podos mediham. Ore, esonand, ki rastagorand»
23|112|[Alloh taolo ʙa duzaxijon] Megujad: «Cand sol dar zamin ʙa sar ʙurded»
23|113|Megujand: «Jak ruz jo ʙaxse az jak ruzro ʙa sar ʙurdem. Az hisoʙgaron [ki hisoʙi ruzu solro nigah medorand] ʙipurs»
23|114|U megujad: «[Ore] Agar medonisted, cuz andake [dar dunjo] ʙa sar naʙurded
23|115|Ojo pindostaed, ki sumoro ʙehuda ofaridaem va ʙa suji Mo ʙozgardonida namesaved
23|116|Pas, ʙalandmartaʙa [va ʙuzurg] ast Alloh taolo [ki] farmonravoi haq ast. Hec ma'ʙude [ʙa haq] cuz U nest [va] Parvardigori Arsi garonqadr ast
23|117|Va har ki ʙo Alloh taolo ma'ʙudi digarero ʙixonad, jaqinan, hec dalele ʙar [haqqonijati] on naxohad dost va hisoʙi u ʙo Parvardigoras xohad ʙud. Be tardid, kofiron rastagor namesavand
23|118|Va [ej Pajomʙar] ʙigu: «Parvardigoro, [gunohonamro] ʙiʙaxsoj va rahm kun va Tu ʙehtarin ʙaxsandai»
